definition: To transfer the responsibility, possession, or control of something to someone else, typically with the intention of entrusting or leaving it in their care. This word is commonly used when referring to the act of giving up or surrendering something to another person or entity.

examples.english: I leave the decision up to you.

examples.german: Er überlässt mir sein Auto für das Wochenende.
examples.english: He is letting me have his car for the weekend.

examples.german: Sie überlassen die Organisation des Events ihrem Assistenten.
examples.english: They are entrusting the organization of the event to their assistant.

examples.german: Der Lehrer überlässt den Schülern die Wahl des Themas.
examples.english: The teacher leaves the choice of the topic to the students.
